Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Among these mutations two are missense ( G197W , W427R ) , two are nonsense ( Q306X , Q385X ) , two are small deletions ( 662de14bp ; 1168del3bp removing a glycine at position 390 ) , and one is a splicing mutation ( IVS1 - 15c - - > g ) which creates a new acceptor splice site .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the disease entities identified in the paragraph:

| Disease |
| --- |
| G197W |
| W427R |
| Q306X |
| Q385X |
| 662de14bp |
| 1168del3bp |
| IVS1-15c->g |
